enWisdom: God-wariness is the reserve for the place of return [in the Hereafter]

Wisdom: إِنَّ تَقْوَى اللَّهِ هِيَ الزَّادُ وَالْمَعَادُ زَادٌ مُبَلِّغٌ وَمَعَادٌ مُنْجِحٌ دَعَا إِلَيْهَا أَسْمَعُ دَاعٍ وَوَعَاهَا خَيْرُ وَاعٍ فَاسْمَعْ دَاعِيَهَا وَفَازَ وَاعِيهَا
enWisdom: Verily the fear of Allah is a provision and a place of returnIt is a provision that takes one to his destination and a prosperous place of returnThe best inviter has called towards it and the most heedful [of people] have heeded to itSo the inviter has told the people about it and those who have given heed to it are successful

Wisdom: إِنَّ تَقْوَى اللَّهِ مِفْتَاحُ سَدَادٍ وَذَخِيرَةُ مَعَادٍ وَعِتْقٌ مِنْ كُلِّ مَلَكَةٍ وَنَجَاةٌ مِنْ كُلِّ هَلَكَةٍ بِهَا يَنْجُو الْهَارِبُ وَتُنْجَحُ الْمَطَالِبُ وَتُنَالُ الرَّغَائِبُ
enWisdom: Indeed the fear of Allah is a key to rightness, a store for the Hereafter, emancipation from every [form of] bondage and safety from every destructionThrough it the runaway is rescued, what is sought is attained and what is desired [of the Hereafter] is acquired

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ لَنْ تَبْلُغَ أَمَلَكَ وَلَنْ تَعْدُوَ أَجَلَكَ فَاتَّقِ اللَّهَ وَأَجْمِلْ فِي الطَّلَبِ
enWisdom: Verily you will not reach what you hope for and will never surpass death, so be conscious of Allah and be moderate in your desires

Wisdom: عَلَيْكُمْ بِالتَّقْوَى فَإِنَّهُ خَيْرُ زَادٍ وَأَحْرَزُ عَتَادٍ
enWisdom: Espouse God-wariness, for it is indeed the best provision and the most protective accoutrement
There is no provision like God-wariness
The most protective shield is God-wariness
If you fear Allah, He will protect you

Wisdom: إِنَّكَ إِنْ تَوَرَّعْتَ تَنَزَّهْتَ عَنْ دَنَسِ السَّيِّئَاتِ
enWisdom: Verily if you adopt piety, you will become free from the filth of evil deeds
Whoever fears Allah, He protects him

Wisdom: لَوْ أَنَّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ كَانَتَا عَلَى عَبْدٍ رَتْقاً ثُمَّ اتَّقَى اللَّهَ لَجَعَلَ اللَّهُ لَهُ مِنْهُمَا مَخْرَجاً وَرَزَقَهُ مِنْ حَيْثُ لا يَحْتَسِبُ
enWisdom: If the heavens and earth were closed upon a servant and then he became God-wary, Allah would surely make for him a way out from them and provide for him from whence he does not reckon

Wisdom: مَنِ اتَّقَى اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ جَعَلَ لَهُ مِنْ كُلِّ هَمٍّ فَرَجاً وَمِنْ كُلِّ ضِيقٍ مَخْرَجاً
enWisdom: Whoever fears Allah, the Glorified, He dispels all worries and gives him a way out of every distress

Wisdom: مَا اتَّقَى أَحَدٌ إِلَّا سَهَّلَ اللَّهُ مَخْرَجَهُ
enWisdom: Nobody becomes God-wary but that Allah makes his way out [of difficulties] easy
